description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

External_Transaction_SourceObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

External_Transaction_SourceObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

External_Transaction_SourceObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

External_Transaction_Source_Data.description: The name of the External Transaction Source.

validation.validation: Name cannot be changed if External Transaction Source is in use.

External_Transaction_Source_Data.description: The description of the External Transaction Source.
The External Transaction Source activation status.

validation.validation: Mark as Inactive is not allowed when creating a new External Transaction Source

External_Transaction_Source_UsageObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

External_Transaction_Source_UsageObjectI.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

External_Transaction_Source_UsageObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: External Transaction Source Usages can not be removed if the External Transaction Source is in use
